subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramirez, who recently finished serving a 50-game ban, was ejected in the fifth for flipping his elbow pad toward an umpire, but not before driving in three runs.
snippet: Manny Ramirez, who recently finished serving a 50-game ban, was ejected in the fifth for flipping his elbow pad toward an umpire, but not before driving in three runs.
